channel.title: A Fistful of Darkness is released - A weird west hack FitD
channel.description:
Not sure if this qualifies for the Hype category but maybe some day.
I'm proud to say that I realeased "A Fistful of Darkness" on itch.io. https://monkeyecho.itch.io/a-fistful-of-darkness
I hope you like it and have fun playing it. Thanks to everybody for support, kind words and inspiration.
-Stefan P.S. Hope you and your family and friends are healthy in these troubled times.

item.title: A Fistful of Darkness is released - A weird west hack FitD
item.dc:creator: @StefanAKAmonkeyEcho
item.description:
@StefanAKAmonkeyEcho wrote:

Just added 20 community copies of “A Fistful of Darkness” to https://monkeyecho.itch.io/a-fistful-of-darkness. If you want to play but cannot pay, grab one! Hope you have fun in the weird west!

Read full topic
